document.full_text: the end of the ivory coast strongman laurent gbagbo's rule appeared to be nearing friday as his rival's troops pressed into the country's main city of abidjan.
document.title: ivory coast battle nears decisive stage in key city
lines_and_colors: the end of the ivory coast strongman laurent gbagbo's rule appeared to be nearing friday as his rival's troops pressed into the country's main city of abidjan.
